title: Spoilers: Mary Poppins Returns
description:
This week on Spoiler Specials, Dan Kois and TV editor at the New York Times, Aisha Harris, discuss Mary Poppins Returns. How does the film stack up to the original? How bad is Lin Manuel-Miranda’s cockney accent? Is there a bigger conspiracy behind Julie Andrews declining to cameo? Listen to them discuss!
Podcast production by Danielle Hewitt.
This episode is brought to you by Helix, a new kind of DNA testing. Try today for a deep discount at helix.com/spoilers.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
